name: @aws-blocks/h2o-gbm-algorithm-resource
description: ðŸ”§ A Sagemaker Algorithm Resource for H2O Gradient Boosting Machines (GBM) as a Cloudformation stack.

notes.text: Initial version release of the `h2o-gbm-algorithm-resource` package.

author: Anil Sener <senera@amazon.com>

scripts.deploy: npm run postinstall && sam deploy --stack-name h2o-gbm-algorithm-resource --region ${npm_config_region}  --s3-bucket ${npm_config_s3bucket} --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides Environment=${npm_config_environment} TrainingImageURI=${npm_config_account_id}.dkr.ecr.${npm_config_region}.amazonaws.com/${npm_config_training_image_name} InferenceImageURI=${npm_config_account_id}.dkr.ecr.${npm_config_region}.amazonaws.com/${npm_config_inference_image_name}
scripts.deploy-win: npm run postinstall && sam deploy --stack-name h2o-gbm-algorithm-resource --region %npm_config_region% --s3-bucket %npm_config_s3bucket% --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides Environment=%npm_config_environment% TrainingImageURI=%npm_config_account_id%.dkr.ecr.%npm_config_region%.amazonaws.com/%npm_config_training_image_name% InferenceImageURI=%npm_config_account_id%.dkr.ecr.%npm_config_region%.amazonaws.com/%npm_config_inference_image_name%
